DataElement.preferredName: Food or Food Substance Product Material Name Code Change Text ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A substance consumed by humans and animals for nutritional purposes. EXAMPLE(S): broccoli, donuts, pet treats A character string that is a revision of the original text of the product to enable the coding of the text. EXAMPLE(S): If the original text is "aspriin", the nameCodeModifiedText could be set to "aspirin", so that the text can be successfully coded.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Food or Food Substance Product Material Name Code Change Text
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Processed or unprocessed substances obtained from animal, plant, microorganism and mining source that provide nutrients for living organisms to maintain biological processes or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._The words or language units by which a thing is known.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Food or Food Substance Product Material
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Processed or unprocessed substances obtained from animal, plant, microorganism and mining source that provide nutrients for living organisms to maintain biological processes or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Concepts.definition: Processed or unprocessed substances obtained from animal, plant, microorganism and mining source that provide nutrients for living organisms to maintain biological processes or functions.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

Concepts.definition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
